EmailTemplate.description: 我們已收到你的餐單更改要求，並會盡快處理 | Your Menu Update request has been received and will be processed ASAP
EmailTemplate.name: FP Menu Change - Update Request
EmailTemplate.subject: 我們已收到你的餐單更改要求，並會盡快處理 | Your Menu Update request has been received and will be processed ASAP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
親愛的合作餐廳：
感謝你的訊息，我們已收到你的請求，並有相關團隊跟進，希望於 24 小時提供解決方案。
謝謝，
你的 foodpanda 合作餐廳服務小組
Dear Restaurant partner,
Hello,
Thank you for your message!
Your request has arrived and is currently being processed by our Partner Service Team.
We will do our best to answer you within 24 hours and solve your request.
Best regards,
Your foodpanda team
